devdoc.details: Supports Morpho Blue (0% fee), Balancer V2 (0% fee), and Aave V3 (0.05% fee)

AddressEmptyCode(address).details: There's no code at `target` (it is not a contract).

AddressInsufficientBalance(address).details: The ETH balance of the account is not enough to perform the operation.

FailedInnerCall().details: A call to an address target failed. The target may have reverted.

OwnableInvalidOwner(address).details: The owner is not a valid owner account. (eg. `address(0)`)

OwnableUnauthorizedAccount(address).details: The caller account is not authorized to perform an operation.

SafeERC20FailedOperation(address).details: An operation with an ERC20 token failed.

params.callbackData: Data to pass back to router after receiving loan
params.lender: The flash loan provider (Morpho or Aave pool)

fundOrder(address,address,uint256).details: Called in pre-hook to fund the order. Only callable during active flash loan settlement.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

params.feeAmounts: Array of fee amounts (0 for Balancer)
params.tokens: Array of tokens borrowed (we only use single token)

receiveFlashLoanV3(bytes).details: V3 uses a different flow: unlock() -> sendTo() to receive -> settle() to repay

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

devdoc.title: KapanCowAdapter

approve(address,address,uint256).notice: Approve a target to spend tokens (standard IBorrower function)

executeOperation(address,uint256,uint256.notice: Called by Aave after flash loan tokens are sent

flashLoanAndCallBack(address,address,uin.notice: Called by FlashLoanRouter to initiate flash loan

fundOrder(address,address,uint256).notice: Transfer flash-loaned tokens to the order recipient (OrderManager)

onMorphoFlashLoan(uint256,bytes).notice: Called by Morpho Blue after flash loan tokens are sent

receiveFlashLoan(address[],uint256[],uin.notice: Called by Balancer V2 Vault after flash loan tokens are sent

receiveFlashLoanV3(bytes).notice: Called by Balancer V3 Vault via unlock() pattern

rescueTokens(address,address,uint256).notice: Rescue tokens accidentally sent to this contract

setAaveLender(address,bool).notice: Add or remove an allowed Aave lender

setBalancerV2Lender(address,bool).notice: Add or remove an allowed Balancer V2 lender

setBalancerV3Lender(address,bool).notice: Add or remove an allowed Balancer V3 lender

setLender(address,bool).notice: Legacy function for backwards compatibility (defaults to Aave)

setMorphoLender(address,bool).notice: Add or remove an allowed Morpho lender

userdoc.notice: Bridges Kapan's OrderManager with CoW Protocol's flash loan system
